title.narrative: Strengthening the Institutional Offer for Colombians Abroad and Their Diasporic Communities, to Enhance Their Contribution to Sustainable Development

description.narrative: This project aims to contribute to the empowerment of the Colombian diaspora as an agent of sustainable development, both for the benefit of their country of origin and destination. This will be achieved by mapping the Colombian diaspora, facilitating their access to information and training on the regulatory frameworks and policies that apply to them, as well as the concrete benefits they represent for their communities, and promoting their participation in the implementation and monitoring of these policies. Thus, this initiative will promote that the government and other non-governmental actors share lessons learned and good practices in relation to the participation of diasporas, and that men and women of the Colombian diaspora actively participate in generating opportunities to contribute to the well-being of home and host communities. During the project’s development, a national and a regional study is foreseen, as well as a regional exchange, the enhancement of a global platform, training of officials and the facilitation of concrete initiatives implemented by diaspora men and women. These actions will be carried out in conjunction with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which will provide the guidelines for adequate coordination with the communities of Colombians abroad that have been prioritized.
